title: Too much water: Downpour's threat
text:
##     Too much water: Downpour's threat 

Due to constant rain and strong wind, inhabitants are requested to stay indoors. Experts claim, it is not safe until after the downpour stops and the overflowing water subsides, which may take up to several hours. 

In  Europe, most damage occurred so far in western Germany, but the east may suffer soon as well. 
In Asia, there was this tsunami in Japan not too long ago. *(Remember Fukushima?)* 
Floods expropriate people all over California. 
Things may truly have gotten dark.

Some enthusiasts claim,
> The world will end soon. There is no denying that. 

Well, there **is **no denying that *Downpour* is also the title of the survival horror game *Silent Hill: Downpour.*
But then again, so it it a festival title: [downpourfestival](http://downpourfestival.com/).

And then there're the businesspeople at [downpourrain.com](http://downpourrain.com/) that sell fancy umbrella. Ah, one might believe they defy nature's force. 

Might. 

Possibly.


So, what do you think is this all about?

Happy rainy weather folks!

comments.content: I stayed dry! If there's strong wind blowing the rain sideways, you can't blaim the umbrella for getting a little wet, dude!
